name: Pomegranate Pantry
description: We are a friendly artisan grocery shop & delicatessen offering a weekly menu of "Dine at Home" meals " made in small batches in our kitchen using top quality locally sourced ingredients. On our deli counter you'll find a selection of quality cheeses and charcuterie as well as homemade savoury and sweet pastries and cakes. Our pantry is filled with ingredients for creative chefs and unusual gourmet treats-great for gifts or just to indulge in yourselves!
safetyTips: All staff wear masks, maximum 3 customers in either side of shop
